snippet: The ruling that J.C. Penney unlawfully interfered with a merchandising agreement may be the penultimate chapter of a long-running dispute among three famous names in retailing.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Jeffrey K Oing rules that J C Penney unlawfully interfered with exclusive merchandising agreement between Macy's and Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia; ruling may be penultimate chapter of long-running dispute among three famous names in retailing.
lead_paragraph: The ruling that J.C. Penney unlawfully interfered with a merchandising agreement may be the penultimate chapter of a long-running dispute among three famous names in retailing.

headline.main: Ruling Against J.C. Penney in Dispute With Macy’s Over Martha Stewart Products
headline.print_headline: Ruling Against Penney in Its Macy’s Dispute
